message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $9000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Can you meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $7500 is a good one, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'd be willing to meet you at $7000. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit higher on the price, but I'm not willing to go below $8100. I'm willing to give you a small discount, but I think this is the lowest I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to give me a small discount, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'd be willing to meet you at $7500. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit higher on the price, but I'm not willing to go below $8000. I'm willing to give you a final chance to meet me at $7800. This is my last offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'd be willing to meet you at $7200. Can you consider that?
Hi Bob, I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate at this point. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $7400. This is my absolute lowest price. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'd be willing to meet you at $7000. This is my final offer.
